mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_record (user_id, friend_id, talk_type, msg_content, msg_type, msg_date, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{friendId}, #{talkType}, #{msgContent}, #{msgType}, #{msgDate}, now(), now())
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, friend_id, msg_content, msg_type, msg_date FROM chat_record where talk_type = 0 and (friend_id = #{talkId} and user_id = #{userId}) or (friend_id = #{userId} and user_id = #{talkId}) order by create_time desc limit 10
SELECT user_id, friend_id, msg_content, msg_type, msg_date FROM chat_record where talk_type = 1 and friend_id = #{talkId} order by create_time desc limit 10
